assemblyInfo.assemblyMethod: FALCON v. 1.3.0 2018.31.08-03.06; FALCON-Unzip v. 1.2.0 6.0.0.47841; purge_dups v. github ca23030ccf4254dfd2d3a5ea90d0eed41c24f88b ca23030ccf4254dfd2d3a5ea90d0eed41c24f88b; bionano Solve v. 3.2.1_04122018; Salsa2 HiC v. 2.2; Arrow polishing and gap filling v. SMRTLink7.0.1; Longranger Align v. 2.2.2; freebayes v. 1.3.1; gEVAL manual curation v. 2020-05-14; VGP assembly pipeline v. 1.6

bioprojects.title: Pogoniulus pusillus (red-fronted tinkerbird) genome, bPogPus1, alternate haplotype

description.comment: The red-fronted tinkerbird, (Pogoniulus pusillus) is a small African barbet and it has strikingly marked red patch above the bill in adults. Young birds lack the red forehead and sexes are similar in appearance. This species is distinguished from the yellow-fronted tinkerbird by the color of the forehead spot, the golden wing patch, and its overall darker appearance. It is often confused with the red-fronted barbet, but it is significantly smaller than that species, has a black mustache and a less robust bill, and lacks a broad yellow superciliary stripe.
description.title: Model organism or animal sample from Pogoniulus pusillus

assemblyInfo.sequencingTech: PacBio Sequel I CLR; Illumina NovaSeq; Arima Genomics Hi-C; Bionano Genomics DLS
